entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (nova_orion_vendor.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_4: Greetings Nova Orion employee, %TU. Feel free to browse our latest prototypes, but you will only be allowed to purchase a schematic if you have the correct authorization. Thank you.
entries.s_6: Welcome to Nova Orion Station. Please refrain from unauthorized use of company property during your visit. Thank you.
